original_title: RMM: Tropical Tribute to the Beatles
overview: Filmed live at Radio City Music Hall in New York, this unique concert features an array of tropicalia and salsa musicians adding a festive Latin twist to some of the Beatles' biggest hits. Highlights include "Let It Be" by Tito Nieves and Tito Puente, "Lady Madonna" by Oscar D'León, "Ob-La-Di, Ob-La-Da" by Celia Cruz, "Hard Day's Night" by Frankie Morales, "Day Tripper" by David Novello and "Fool on the Hill" by Ray Sepúlveda.
title: RMM: Tropical Tribute to the Beatles
